images.caption: Figure 1:Toy example illustrating DDO. (a) Models pretrained via maximum likelihood estimation (MLE) exhibit dispersed density, while DDO imposes contrastive forces toward the data distribution. (b) The finetuned model concentrates better on the main mode.
